ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject

Class Searcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.Searcher

  • public class Searcher
extends java.lang.Object
    Uses the ultrasonic and light sensors mounted to the front of the robot to search for the 'flag'. When it is found, the robot beeps to indicate capture.

    This class works along with the navigator to move around the search zone, looking for the 'flag'.
